title: Find My Bearings - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Romance   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life   Yaoi
tags: Bickering Couple   Blind Protagonist   Cohabitation   Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   Devoted Love Interests   Disabilities   Doting Love Interests   Early Romance   Heartwarming   Modern Day   Older Love Interests   Short Story
author: 杏仁茶
description: After getting into an accident, Ji Xiaobei’s world turned dark and gloomy, all until one day, he was introduced to an app which aided the blind. Through his daily communications with Chen Zhuo on the app, the two started to develop mutual dependency on each other. However, when Ji Xiaobei discovered that Chen Zhuo was the creator of the app, he started distancing himself away from him.>
